entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 21 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of drizzle and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
